summary: Young farmer Paavo's wife dies in childbirth, and their baby soon after. The wife's family claim back the dowry she brought to their marriage, but Paavo has already used most of it for ... See full summary »
cast: Gunnar Hiilloskorpi|Mirjami Kuosmanen|Hugo Hytönen|Helvi Järveläinen|Annie Mörk|Emmi Jurkka|Onni Veijonen|Hertta Leistén|Simo Osa|Jalmari Parikka|Arvi Tuomi|Sven Relander|Lida Salin|Elna Hellman|Maija Nuutinen|Pentti Viljanen|Verna Piponius|Aku Peltonen|Einari Ketola|Helvi Erjakka|Kyösti Käyhkö|Jussi Piironen|Irja Kuusla|F.E. Sillanpää
title: Miehen tie
